snippet: As competition intensifies, bar owners are pursuing novel touches to distinguish their wares, including offering liquor smoothies and garnishes that become small plates.
abstract: Preview of bars, with an emphasis on cocktails, opening in New York City as fall nears.
lead_paragraph: As competition intensifies, bar owners are pursuing novel touches to distinguish their wares, including offering liquor smoothies and garnishes that become small plates.

headline.seo: New Bars for the Clinking of Glasses
headline.main: New Bars Shy Away From Serving It Neat
headline.print_headline: New Bars Shy Away From Serving It Neat
